title: Chef Games S01E03 - Extreme Courses 480p IggY.mp4
description:
First, apologies: It's a fantastic show in Hebrew without English subtitles.  And even worse, there are hardcoded Hebrew subtitles.  Sorry. Really!  This is all that's available right now.

This is a 24 part television show where three very successful Israeli chefs select the best chef from a huge group of hopefuls.  Background, ethnicity, training and age are not an issue.  Tasting and selections are blind, which I think is brilliant.

The first seven episodes are the auditions to select the top 30 out of so-many-I-have-no-idea, then the chefs select their teams and mentor them during the kitchen battles and competition where one by one they are eliminatedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ and then to the finals.
